title: Fromage Fort
excerpt: When I’ve got too many cheese bits on hand, it's now fromage fort to the rescue
ingredients: 8 ounces (225g) cheese pieces, hard rinds removed
a few turns of freshly ground black pepper
pinch of cayenne or red pepper powder
1 tablespoon minced chives or flat-leaf parsley

title: Classic Ragu Bolognese
excerpt: A certain magic happens as the beef and aromatic vegetables slowly cook down with wine, tomato paste, and broth
ingredients: 3 oz. thinly sliced pancetta, finely chopped
3 cups (about) beef stock or chicken stock, divided
Kosher salt and freshly ground black pepper
1 lb. tagliatelle or fettuccine (preferably fresh egg)

title: Animal-Cracker Cookies
excerpt: Create and decorate magical cookies that are as much fun as a day at the circus!
ingredients: 12 Tbs. (1 1/2 sticks) unsalted butter, at room temperature

title: Chicken in Mole
excerpt: If there is one dish that could be considered Mexican haute cuisine, then Mole Poblano is surely it
ingredients: Sea salt and ground black pepper to taste
2 tablespoons sesame seeds, toasted, for garnish
1 cup plus 9 tablespoons vegetable oil or lard plus additional as needed
4 or 5 tomatillos, husked and cooked until soft
1-inch piece of a Mexican cinnamon stick
1 tablespoon seeds from the chiles, toasted
3 stale French rolls, cut into 1-inch slices
6 to 7 cups reserved chicken broth as needed

title: Fatted Calf's Meatlof
excerpt: It is a thing of beauty, shaped into a large oval loaf and glazed with tangy cocktail sauce
ingredients: 1 1/4 pound boneless lean beef from eye of round or sirloin, cut into 1-inch cubes
1 pound boneless pork picnic, cut into 1-inch cubes
4 ounces pork back fat, cut into 1-inch cubes

title: Spanish Asparagus Revuelto
excerpt: In Spain, wild asparagus is very popular, and it’s a sure sign of spring
ingredients: 2 peeled garlic cloves, plus 1/2 teaspoon minced garlic
2 cups bread cubes, made with day-old bread, cut in 1/2-inch cubes
1 bunch thin asparagus, about 1 1/2 pounds, cut in 1- to 2-inch lengths

title: Lahmacun - Turkish Pizza w/ Spicy Minced Beef & Salad Topping
ingredients: 250g white flour, plus extra to dust

title: Easiest Spaghetti & Meatballs
excerpt: No pasta's more iconic than spaghetti and meatballs
ingredients: 1/4 cup finely grated Parmesan, plus more for serving
1 can (28 ounces) crushed tomatoes in puree

title: Apricots Honey Panna Cotta
excerpt: Juicy, fragrant, perfectly textured for a little fire action

title: Slanted Door's Shaking Beef
excerpt: Cubes of tender filet mignon are sautéed with red onions and a vinaigrette
ingredients: 1 1/2 - 2 pounds filet mignon, fat trimmed and cut into 1 1/4-inch cubes
1 cup thinly sliced red onion, preferably spring onions
3 stalks green onion, trimmed and cut to 1-inch lengths

title: Bavarian-style Soft Pretzel
ingredients: 1 tablespoon barley malt syrup or dark brown sugar
2 tablespoons lard or softened unsalted butter
Coarse sea salt or pretzel salt, for sprinkling (do not substitute kosher salt)

title: Elderberry Syrup
excerpt: The gorgeous syrup is great in a glass of sparkling water over ice, dripped some over plain yogurt
ingredients: 2 pounds (1kg) elderberries, stems removed and rinsed

title: Spaghetti with Lemon & Olive Oil
excerpt: This is one of those recipes that are almost better off without one
ingredients: 1/4 cup extra virgin olive oil , plus additional for serving
1 ounce finely grated Parmesan cheese (about 1/2 cup), plus additional for serving
Small handful fresh basil or arugula leaves, shredded

title: Homemade Pasta Dough
ingredients: 2 Cups 00 Flour or 4 cups All-Purpose Flour

title: Diner Style Hamburgers
excerpt: This is the traditional, griddled hamburger of diners and takeaway spots, smashed thin and cooked crisp on its edges
ingredients: 1/2 teaspoon neutral oil, like canola, or a pat of unsalted butter
2 pounds ground chuck, at least 20 percent fat
Kosher salt and black pepper to taste
Lettuce leaves, sliced tomatoes and condiments

title: Grits Praline & Brown Butter Ice Cream
excerpt: "Decadent" isn’t a word we throw around lightly
ingredients: 2 ounces Anson Mills Antebellum Coarse Yellow Grits or Antebellum Coarse White Grits

title: Roasted Butternut Squash Lasagna
excerpt: Making homemade pasta may seem arduous, but this dish is worth the extra work
ingredients: 2 large butternut squashes (about 2 pounds each), halved lengthwise and seeded
Coarse salt and freshly ground pepper
1 stick unsalted butter, cut into pieces
2 1/4 cups finely grated Parmesan cheese (about 8 ounces)
6 tablespoons unsalted butter, cut into pieces

title: Peanut Butter Cookie with Salted Peanut Caramel
excerpt: This recipe takes Peanut Butter Cookies to the next level
ingredients: 8 tablespoons (115g) unsalted butter, at room temperature
1 tablespoon light corn syrup or glucose
3/4 cup (100g) finely chopped roasted salted peanuts

title: Bucatini all' Amatriciana
excerpt: This dish is named for the town of Amatrice...considered by many Italians to be birthplace of the best cooks on the peninsula
ingredients: 12 ounces thinly sliced guanciale pancetta, or good bacon
1 red onion, cut lengthwise in half and then into 1/4-inch-thick half-moons

title: Orecchiette with red lamb sausage & carrots
excerpt: Chef di Cucina Matt Abdoo expounded on the virtues of the fundamental building block of Italian cooking: fresh pasta

title: Chocolate Chai Spice Cupcake
excerpt: The moist chocolatey goodness of the cake can live on its own

title: Mexican Rice
ingredients: 2 cups canned tomatoes (fresh tomatoes can be used)
1/2 cup green bell pepper, roughly chopped
1/2 medium jalapeño, seeds and veins removed
1 heaping cup long-grain white rice, rinsed

title: Whole Wheat Goldfish Crackers
ingredients: 6 ounces (1 1/2 cups coarsely grated) sharp cheddar
1/2 cup (2 1/2 ounces or 62 grams) whole wheat flour
1/4 cup (1 1/8 ounces or 31 grams) all-purpose flour

title: Italian Red-Wine Braised Duck with Olive Gremolata
excerpt: A good braise always trumps a steak or a roast, both in terms of complex flavors and satisfaction
ingredients: 1/2 teaspoon coriander seed, toasted and coarsely ground
1/2 teaspoon fennel seed, toasted and coarsely ground
1 4-inch strip of orange peel, pith removed
1 cup chopped canned or fresh tomatoes
Pinch cayenne or red pepper, optional

title: Pierre Hermé & Dorie Greenspan's World Peace Cookies
excerpt: Shortbread cookie meets salted chocolate chip, and world peace feels within reach
ingredients: 1 stick plus 3 tablespoons (11 tablespoons) unsalted butter, room temperature
1/2 teaspoon fleur del sel or 1/4 teaspoon fine sea salt
5 ounces bittersweet chocolate, chopped into chips, or a generous 3/4 cup store-bought mini chocolate chips

title: Braised eggs with beef, smoked aubergine and tomato
ingredients: 1 tbsp olive oil, plus extra for drizzling

title: Pomegranate Hibiscus Tea & Hony Ginger Yogurt Verrines
Chocolate Tart
excerpt: A good chocolate tart doesn’t need to be fancy, but it needs to be deep, dark, and yes, somewhat decadent.
ingredients: 4 ounces (115 g) unsalted butter, cubed, room temperature
4 ounces (115 g) bittersweet or semisweet chocolate, chopped
1 tablespoon dark rum or 1 teaspoon vanilla extract

title: Cashew Gateau with Coffe Cardamom Mousse
excerpt: The inspiration for the caramel stained "glass" panel comes from my grandmother
ingredients: 1 tsp powdered unflavored gelatin, softened in 1 tablespoon cold water
3/4 cup chopped chocolate or chocolate chips (about 6 oz or 180 gr)
